comment._content: Katherine Sedgwick Sands, only daughter of Dr. Robert Alfred Sands and Kate Van Volkenburgh Sands, married John M. P. Thatcher of Kentucky, in November 1915. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F40810F9395D16... They're both listed in this 1923 passenger roster for the Berengaria, as arriving in New York from Cherbourg, France: www.nytimes.com/1987/02/07/obituaries/richard-leach-75-fo... The Thatchers lived on Park Avenue, with a second home at Bayville, Long Island, and had several children. Their son John Jr. was a vice president at Paine Webber. Their daughter Katherine Sands Thatcher married Richard Porter Leach, who served as director of programming at Lincoln Center. She was still alive in 1987. Richard Porter Leach's 1987 obituary: www.nytimes.com/1987/02/07/obituaries/richard-leach-75-fo...
